1.20.1.1.3.0a: fix crash when loading the mod on servers, add better error checking for scripts.
1.20.1.1.3.0b: fix horde event progression getting stuck
1.20.1.1.3.1: fix numerous bugs and issues, add a visual effect to the night sky on horde nights
1.20.1.1.3.2: add husk players, infection immunity and fix varous bugs
1.20.1.1.3.2a: fix incorrect day calculation with hordeEventByPlayerTime
1.20.1.1.3.2b: fix crashes when disabling infection or horde events in the config
1.20.1.1.4.0: add many new conditions and functions, including gamestage support and restricting what blocks mobs can spawn on
1.20.1.1.5.0: massive datapack changes, a lot of new additions, and several bugs fixed
